item.title: Education Projects
item.description: Teacher Training Website CUNY - City Technology Devised a simplified user input interface for adding text, video and image data. It allows for drag-and-drop arranging/re-arranging of elements once they have been added to the page. User Workshops Needs Assessment Recruiting Information Arcitecture Editorial UX Informal User Testing Living Museum The Living Museum program turns children into museum curators complete with an exhibition (typically in a school hall for one afternoon).
